experience.title: Software Developer Intern
info: As a front-end developer, managed several deployed ITMS (Integrated Traffic Management System) and InForm (Asset Management) projects using ReactJS, Redux, and various JavaScript frameworks.
Contributed technical efforts in building new functionalities and improvements.
Used Nightwatch.js to conduct research and automate testing for two projects and more than 100 components.

experience.title: Graduate Technology Assistant
info: Built and maintained a WordPress database for material culture to record old artefacts.
Redesigned the project's organizational structure and investigated ways to move current data to a new relational database to reduce resource costs overall by 50%.
â€¢	Improved the application's operating efficiency by 30% by identifying and resolving the problem with utilising jQuery to link spreadsheet responses to Google Forms.

experience.company: Spin In at University of Delaware
experience.title: UI/UX Front End Developer
info: Developed Peer-to-Peer marketplace platform for a Progressive Web application using advanced ReactJS technology.
Appointed as front-end developer to execute 90% of duties, including writing APIs, Database and Front End and Back End connection.
Used API, stating tables, and web services to integrate front end and back end systems.
